name: Crystal Heart
description:
An Interactive visual novel game made for I Can't Write. game jam. 

Summary:

Crystal Heart is about defeating an evil king. The prince and younger brother of the king, Vonsu, is the player character. His adventure involves finding relics, and travelling to different realms. His mission is to stab the heart of the king, the only way to kill him. But, there is something about the king's heart that shocked Vonsu...

Credits:

Story: Aria Carina

Designs: Aria Carina and Mervzs

Music/SFX: Sorax
